titleStmt.title: SII 8.82: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 82. (A.R. No. 492 of 1902). ON THE SAME WALL.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . tiṅkaḷerpiṟā vaḷara ṅkatirkkaṭavuṭ ṭolkulam viḷaṅkat toṉṟi malkiya vaṭaticaik kaṅkaiyum n=teṉṟicai yilaṅkaiyuṅ kuṭaticai mahotaiyuṅ kuṇaticaik kaṭāramu n=taṇṭār koṇṭa tātai taṉ maṇṭalaveṇkuṭai niḻaṟṟitticaitoṟum ceṅkolocci Icaikeḻu teṉṉavaṉ māṉāparaṇaṉ peṉmuṭiyāṉāp parumaṇiypacun=ta lai perukaḷat tarin=tu veṇāṭṭaraicaai ceṇāṭ ṭotukkik kūvakattaraicaic cevaka n=tulaittu velaikeḻu kān=taḷūrcālai kala maṟuttaḷittu tikkeḻuñ jayaṅkoṇṭacoḻaneṉṉum matikeḻu kovirācakecaripanmarāṉa Uṭaiyār śrīrājātirājadevaṟki yāṇṭu 3 10 2Āvatu
tiruvuṇṇāḻikaisabhaiyom paṇimakaṉ kṣatriyaśikāmaṇivaḷaṉāṭṭu tiruṉaṟaiyūrṉāṭṭu Eṭṭiciṟuveḷūr kiḻavaṉ Araṅka ṉaravaṇaiyāṉāṉa vaḷavativākara muven=taveḷāṉpakkal poliyūṭṭāl koṇṭa poṉ Irukaḻañcuṅ koṇṭu Āṭṭaiviṭṭaṉ poliyālp poṉ kaḻañciṉvāy poṉ muṉṟu mañcāṭiyu māṟumāvāka van=ta poṉ mummañcāṭiyuṅ kuṉṟiyuṅ koṇṭu tiruvaṇṇā malaiUṭaiyār koyilil Āṭavalār kāt=tikaik kāttikai viḻāvil tevar Aruḷumaṉṟu cān=tāṭalukku Āṭavalārkkuc cāttiAruḷa cān=tu mukkāl cān=tu Āḻāk=kum Eḻun=taruḷumpotu tūvac cān=tuk=kum cān=tu nāḻiyāl cān=tu muṉṉāḻiyum Arait=tu
nām Iṟṟaināḷāl Ippaṭi ceytu Āṭṭāṇṭutoṟuñ cantrātittavaṟ Inivan=ta ññc celuttuvataṟkāka kṣatriyaśikāmaṇivaḷanāṭṭu tirunaṟaiyūrnāṭṭu Eṭṭiciṟuveḷūr kiḻavaṉ Araṅka ṉaravaṇaiyāṉāṉa vaḷavativākara muven=taveḷāṉa pakkal Ippoṉ koṇṭu Ippaṭi nivan=tañ celuttuvatāṉom Ittevā tiruvuṇṇāḻikai sabhaiyom .
Digital edition of SII 8.82 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
